title: 109_s3536
content: Iran Intelligence Oversight Act - Requires the Director of National Intelligence, within 90 days after the enactment of this Act, to submit to Congress an updated National Intelligence Estimate on Iran. Directs, within the same time frame: (1) the President to report on the objectives of US policy on Iran, as well as the strategy for achieving such objectives. And (2) the Director to report on the process for vetting and clearing statements of Administration officials that are drawn from or rely upon intelligence.
